bug.author: paoloq
bug.summary: DocBin's init has an issue with `attrs` as a `list`
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Error</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>attrs = sorted(intify_attrs(attrs)) File "attrs.pyx", line 144, in spacy.attrs.intify_attrs AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'items' </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
doc_bin = DocBin(attrs=["LEMMA", "ENT_IOB", "ENT_TYPE"]) <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 2.2.0 Platform: Linux-4.9.0-9-amd64-x86_64-with-debian-10.1 Python version: 3.7.3

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. I can't believe I didn't have tests for that :(. We should have a patch up today.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
